Field.Name: ModelPublishCreateNew
Field.value: You are about to create a new version of a published model, doing so will only apply changes once the new version is published. At that point, the changes will only apply to tactics that start after the chosen effective date of the updated version. Do you wish to continue?

Field.Name: ModelPublishEdit
Field.value: You are about to edit a published model, doing so will apply changes across all plans associated with this version of the model, even to tactics that have already commenced. Do you wish to continue?

Field.value: Can't remove one or more tactic(s) because it is currently attached to plan {0}

Field.Name: ModelPublishComfirmation
